named-query.name: getSetPartBySetAndPrtColorId
named-query.query: select sp from SetPartEntity sp where sp.set.id = :setId and sp.partColor.id = :partColorId

named-query.name: getSetPartsCount
named-query.query: select count(1) from SetPartEntity s where s.set.id = :setId

named-native-query.name: getSetPartsBySetId
named-native-query.query: select id, setId, partColorId, partsCount, colorNumber, alternateColorNumber, number, alternateNumber, partName, hexColor from ( select sp.LEGO_ID as id, sp.LEGO_SET_ID as setId, pc.LEGO_ID as partColorId, sp.LEGO_COUNT as partsCount, lpc.LEGO_NUMBER as colorNumber, (select string_agg(lpc1.lego_number, ', ' order by lpc1.lego_number) from LEGO_PART_COLOR_NUMBER lpc1 where lpc1.LEGO_PART_COLOR_ID = pc.lego_id and lego_main = false) as alternateColorNumber, lpn.LEGO_NUMBER as number, (select string_agg(lpn1.lego_number, ', ' order by lpn1.lego_number) from lego_part_number lpn1 where lpn1.lego_part_id = p.lego_id and lego_main = false) as alternateNumber, p.LEGO_NAME as partName, c.LEGO_HEX_COLOR as hexColor, c.LEGO_NAME as colorName, c.LEGO_ID as colorId, ca.LEGO_ID as categoryId from LEGO_SET_PART sp join LEGO_PART_COLOR pc on pc.LEGO_ID = sp.LEGO_PART_COLOR_ID join LEGO_PART p on p.LEGO_ID = pc.LEGO_PART_ID join LEGO_PART_CATEGORY ca on ca.LEGO_ID = p.LEGO_PART_CATEGORY_ID join LEGO_COLOR c on c.LEGO_ID = pc.LEGO_COLOR_ID join LEGO_PART_NUMBER lpn on lpn.LEGO_PART_ID = p.LEGO_ID and lpn.LEGO_MAIN = true join LEGO_PART_COLOR_NUMBER lpc on lpc.LEGO_PART_COLOR_ID = pc.LEGO_ID and lpc.LEGO_MAIN = true where sp.LEGO_SET_ID = :setId) a order by id desc
